as an infant, but her succession was disputed by the Carlists, who refused to 
recognize a female sovereign, leading to the Carlist Wars. After a troubled reign, 
she was deposed in the Glorious Revolution of 1868, and formally abdicated in 
1870. ... Full name. Mara Isabel Luisa de Borbn y Borbn-Dos Sicilias...
